title: Tea market : major importing countries worldwide 2018
yAxis: Trade value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Trade value in million U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The Trade value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Country Pakistan and lowest at Country Canada.
The lowest value at Country Canada is 3.93x times less than the highest value at Pakistan.

max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Trade value in million U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
Country Pakistan has the highest Trade value in million U.S. dollars and Canada has the lowest Trade value in million U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Trade value in million U.S. dollars is found at Country Russian Federation.
The difference of Trade value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Country is 425.78.
The Country Pakistan has the highest Trade value in million U.S. dollars, followed by Russian Federation, and USA. Down to the Country Canada which is the lowest.
The Country Pakistan tends to be 2.0 percent higher than average.
The Trade value in million U.S. dollars is 4289.19 if we add up values of all Countrys.
